channel.title: Holy books
channel.description:
So if I did somthing like this [code] public String[] zamorakBook = { "Two great warriors,", "joined by hand,", "to spread destruction across the land,", "In Zamorak's name,", "now two are one." };[/code]
Wouldn't I put this for the useitem [code]c.forcedChat(zamorakBook);[/code]
I'm clueless :o
Thanks for the help
